enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a Collection and a Transformer as input, making them suitable for similar test setup scenarios.

enhanced_by.method_name: IndexedCollection(Collection<C>, Transformer<C, K>, MultiMap<K, C>, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The constructor initializes the IndexedCollection similarly to uniqueIndexedCollection, making it useful for setting up test cases.
The add method throws an IllegalArgumentException if the index enforces uniqueness, similar to the behavior of uniqueIndexedCollection.
The get method retrieves elements based on the index, which can be used to verify the correctness of the uniqueIndexedCollection's index.
